sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Toast } from 'primereact/toast'; import { Panel } from 'primereact/panel'; import Moment from "react-moment"; export const InventoryDetailInfo = (props) => { const { asset } = props; const toast = useRef(null); const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{t('common:inventory.assetId')}: {asset.assetId}
{t('common:inventory.productId')}: {asset.product?.productId}
{t('common:inventory.productName')}: {asset.product?.productName}
{t('common:inventory.quantityOnHandTotal')} {asset.quantityOnHandTotal != null && asset.quantityOnHandTotal.toLocaleString()}
{t('common:inventory.availableToPromiseTotal')} {asset.availableToPromiseTotal != null && asset.availableToPromiseTotal.toLocaleString()}
{t('common:inventory.receivedDate')} {asset.receivedDate && {asset.receivedDate}}
{t('common:inventory.manufacturedDate')} {asset.manufacturedDate && {asset.manufacturedDate}}
{t('common:inventory.expectedEndOfLife')} {asset.expectedEndOfLife && {asset.expectedEndOfLife}}
{t('common:inventory.statusId')} {asset.statusId}
{t('common:inventory.lastUpdatedStamp')} {asset.lastUpdatedStamp && {asset.lastUpdatedStamp}}
{t('common:inventory.facilityId')}: {asset.facility?.facilityId}
{t('common:inventory.facilityName')} {asset.facility?.facilityName}
{t('common:inventory.ownerId')}: {asset.owner?.ownerPartyId}
{t('common:inventory.ownerName')} {asset.owner?.ownerId}
{t('common:inventory.lotNumber')}: {asset.lot?.lotNumber}
{t('common:inventory.manufacturedDate')} {asset.lot?.manufacturedDate && {asset.lot.manufacturedDate}}
{t('common:inventory.expirationDate')} {asset.lot?.expirationDate && {asset.lot.expirationDate}}
); }; InventoryDetailInfo.propTypes = { asset: PropTypes.object.isRequired };
